name: Paraneoplastic Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorder (PNMOSD)
chief_complaint: I've been having blurry vision, weakness in my legs, and I feel like I can't control my bladder anymore.
prognosis: Guarded - neurological deficits often persist despite treatment; survival dependent on underlying malignancy control
description: A rare paraneoplastic variant of NMOSD where autoantibodies against aquaporin-4 channels cross-react with tumor antigens, causing severe demyelination of optic nerves and spinal cord. Distinct from classic NMOSD by its rapid progression and association with occult malignancies.
